meanings.definition: A type of open-air passenger vehicle, typically used for sightseeing tours.
meanings.sent1: The tourists enjoyed the ride on the charabanc through the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The charabanc stopped at all the famous landmarks for the sightseers to take photos.
meanings.sent3: The charabanc driver made a wrong turn and ended up in a field of cows, much to the amusement of the passengers.
meanings.sent4: The charabanc of memories carried them through the nostalgia of their youth.
meanings.sent5: The bright red charabanc stood out against the green landscape, a picture-perfect moment.

meanings.definition: A large motor coach used for transporting passengers on excursions.
meanings.sent1: The charabanc was filled with excited travelers ready for a day of adventure.
meanings.sent2: The charabanc rumbled along the highway, taking the passengers to their destination.
meanings.sent3: The charabanc driver had to swerve to avoid a pothole, causing a wave of laughter among the passengers.
meanings.sent4: The charabanc of dreams carried them to far-off places they had only imagined.
meanings.sent5: The sleek silver charabanc gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of exploration and discovery.
